name: Two Words Into One Will Go Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Informal name for father - and - growth of thick skin on toes.

(Don't forget to read the hints)
To the rear - and - the action of burning.
Defensive military structure - and - the hours of darkness.
Beneath a surface - and - a domesticated mammal.
A very light colour - and - clean with soapy water.
Device for opening locks - and - piece of rock.
Long weapon with a point - and - a place where coins are made.
The darkest colour - and - nursery rhyme Jill's partner
Product of bees - and - Earth's natural satellite.
